Text: If I drop seeding for a it's because I've rebooted the computer to play videogames.  If this happens, just leave the torrent open and I will be back to finish seeding.  Just be patient.  :)

I remember when this was advertised in 2000AD comic years ago.  The thing that got me on the advert were the words "Extreme Violence & Gore!", so my girlfriend bought it for my birthday.  Then I watched it and thought "WTF!!!"  Even without the rudity, it's still a good film IMHO!  Thanks for the upload!
